nodes.text: Vericks was a male senator during the Cold War who replaced Vanara Kayl as senator of the Coruscant sector following the exposure of her dealings with the Migrant Merchants' Guild in 3643 BBY. By that time, he was on a financial subcommittee, and had a full schedule most days.

Vericks is only briefly mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in an ambient conversation in the Senate Building on Coruscant. A Coruscanti petitioner from the Old Galactic Market refers to Vericks as "their" Senator, meaning that Vericks is the Senator of Coruscant. Since Senator Kayl served since the Sacking of Coruscant in 3653 BBY, and the light side storyline of the mission involving Kayl results in her resignation, it is assumed that Vericks is Kayl's successor.
